overview.en: Credit Check Chain - 'Credit Score of Ethereum' is an ETH L2 public chain based on the credit system, dedicated to creating a new Ethereum World with the principle of 'no trade without credit check'.
overview.zh: Credit Check Chain - “以太坊信用评分”是一条基于信用体系的ETH L2公链，致力于以“没有信用检查就没有交易”的原则，打造一个新的以太坊世界。
